description:
At Black Law Offices, LLC, we represent people throughout Northeast Georgia in a wide variety of criminal, DUI and traffic matters.

Facing the consequences of criminal charges is stressful. Attorney Sean Black will listen as you share the circumstances of your case, offer practical advice and help to develop a strategy for resolving your matter quickly and cost-effectively. With an experienced lawyer representing your interests throughout every stage of your case, you can confidently make decisions that help you resolve the immediate issue and make intelligent plans for your future.

Criminal defense:

  • Search and seizure
  • Drug crimes
  • Violent crimes
  • Parole and probation
  • Appeals, motions and habeas corpus
  • State registry issues
DUI Defense
  • Administrative License Suspensions
  • Medication DUI Cases
  • Marijuana DUI cases
  • DUI Drugs Cases
  • DUI Refusal Cases
  • DUI Alcohol Cases
  • We have the background, experience and training to get the best outcome

Traffic Defense

  • Speeding Tickets
  • Super Speeder Cases
  • Fleeing/Eluding, Reckless Driving, Aggressive Driving and other serious offenses
  • Suspended License and Registration Cases
  • CDL Driver Issues
  • No License Cases - Non-Citizen Cases
  • Out-of-State Drivers Issues
